data.title: Access the SmartPlant Foundation Web Client - Intergraph Smart P&ID - Help - Intergraph
data.meta_description: In the authoring tool, select SmartPlant > Browser. This command is available only if you have registered the active plant using the SmartPlant Registration Wizard. See Smart Engineering Manager Online Help. From the SmartPlant Foundation Web Client, you can perform a number of tasks, such as publishing or retrieving d...
data.text:
This command is available only if you have registered the active plant using the SmartPlant Registration Wizard. See Smart Engineering Manager Online Help.

From the SmartPlant Foundation Web Client, you can perform a number of tasks, such as publishing or retrieving documents, comparing documents, subscribing to document changes, and so forth. Many of these tasks can be performed from the authoring tools, such as Smart P&ID or Smart Electrical, but the Web Client provides unique access to other features such as the Web Client To Do List and search capabilities.
